tools.name: web_search
tools.description: Search the web for current information using OpenAI's reliable web search. Use this when you need to find recent or real-time information about topics, news, current events, or any information that might have changed recently.

tools.name: news_search
tools.description: Search for latest news articles on any topic using multiple news APIs

tools.name: weather_api
tools.description: Get current weather conditions and forecasts for any location. Use this tool when users ask about weather, need weather information for planning, or want to check conditions for travel or outdoor activities.

tools.name: csv_processor
tools.description: Process and analyze CSV data with various operations

tools.name: database_query
tools.description: Execute database queries safely with parameterized queries

tools.name: data_scraper
tools.description: Scrape data from websites using various methods including CSS selectors

tools.name: file_processor
tools.description: Process various file types including text, CSV, JSON, and images

tools.name: image_processor
tools.description: Process images including resizing, filtering, and format conversion

tools.name: pdf_processor
tools.description: Process PDF files including text extraction and image extraction

tools.name: text_analyzer
tools.description: Perform various text analysis operations including sentiment analysis

tools.name: translation_service
tools.description: Translate text between multiple languages using Deep Translator

tools.name: data_visualization
tools.description: Create charts and graphs from data

tools.name: statistical_analysis
tools.description: Perform statistical analysis on datasets

tools.name: calendar_manager
tools.description: Check, create, update, or delete calendar events and appointments. Use this tool when users ask about their schedule, appointments, or need to schedule meetings. Essential for appointment management and calendar queries.

add_meet_link.description: Add Google Meet video link to the event

tools.name: reminder_tool
tools.description: Set and manage reminders with notifications

tools.name: date_calculator
tools.description: Perform date calculations and formatting operations

tools.name: email_sender
tools.description: Send emails and notifications to users. Use this tool when users need to send emails, receive confirmations, or get notifications about appointments, meetings, or other important information.

config._note: from_email will auto-fallback to username if not provided

tools.name: slack_integration
tools.description: Send messages to Slack channels and manage Slack operations

tools.name: notification_service
tools.description: Send various types of notifications including push notifications

tools.name: social_media
tools.description: Interact with various social media platforms

tools.name: google_sheets_integration
tools.description: Read and write data to Google Sheets

tools.name: payment_processor
tools.description: Process payments, handle refunds, and manage payment analytics

tools.name: webhook_handler
tools.description: Handle webhooks including sending webhooks to external services

tools.name: zapier_webhook
tools.description: Trigger Zapier automations via webhooks

tools.name: multi_link_scraper
tools.description: Store multiple website links and intelligently scrape relevant content based on user queries

description.description: Brief description of what this link contains

tags.description: Tags to help identify relevant content

links.description: List of website links to store and scrape

max_content_length.description: Maximum length of scraped content per page

relevance_threshold.description: Minimum relevance score to include content (0-1)

tools.name: chromadb_tool
tools.description: Upload files, extract them into ChromaDB collections, and query for agent use

collection_name.description: Name of the ChromaDB collection to use

chunk_size.description: Size of text chunks for embedding

tools.name: mongodb_advanced
tools.description: Connect to MongoDB with credentials and query data for agent use

database_name.description: Name of the database to connect to

max_query_time.description: Maximum query execution time in seconds

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return

tools.name: pdf_generator
tools.description: Generate professional PDF files from markdown content with various templates and styling

include_header.description: Include header with title and date

tools.name: website_knowledge_base
tools.description: Comprehensive website scraping and knowledge base tool. Automatically crawls entire websites, extracts content using multiple strategies, and stores it in ChromaDB for intelligent retrieval. Perfect for creating searchable knowledge bases from your own website content.

website_name.description: Name for the knowledge base (used for collection name)

base_url.description: Website URL to scrape and build knowledge base from

collection_name.description: Name of the knowledge base collection to query. First run 'list_collections' operation to see available collections, then use the collection name from the results.

query.description: Search query for knowledge base retrieval

max_pages.description: Maximum number of pages to crawl

tools.name: hubspot
tools.description: Comprehensive HubSpot tool for analytics and data retrieval. Search and analyze contacts, companies, deals, tickets, and more with AI-powered data processing and enrichment. Supports analytics, data enrichment, and smart search across all HubSpot objects. Only requires HubSpot API key for full functionality.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

object_types.description: Object types to search in smart search

tools.name: reddit_tool
tools.description: Discover trending content from Reddit for social media creation. Find viral posts, analyze engagement, and format content for Twitter, Instagram, and TikTok.

tools.name: rss_feed_tool
tools.description: Fetch and process RSS feeds from multiple sources for content discovery. Aggregates content from BBC News, TechCrunch, Hacker News, Reddit feeds, and more with content filtering and social media formatting.

hours_back.description: How many hours back to look (optional)

format_for.description: Platform to format for (twitter, instagram, tiktok) (optional)

tools.name: telegram_tool
tools.description: Fetch and process content from Telegram channels and groups. Access content from Durov, Telegram, TechCrunch, BBC, and more with message filtering, media extraction, and social media formatting.

hours_back.description: How many hours back to look (optional)

format_for.description: Platform to format for (twitter, instagram, tiktok) (optional)

tools.name: web_automation
tools.description: Automate web interactions using Playwright. Navigate websites, fill forms, click elements, extract data, take screenshots, generate PDFs, and execute JavaScript. Perfect for testing, data collection, and workflow automation.

url.description: URL to navigate to (required for navigate action)

form_data.description: Form data to fill (for fill_form action)

selector.description: CSS selector for click or extract actions
